Lack enough support: The claim that Sara Duterte will run for president in 2022 lacks enough support as there is no formal announcement from Sara Duterte regarding her presidential bid.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that President Duterte is set to finish his six-year term in 2022 and cannot run for reelection.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the claim, as the original image from The Philippine Star in 2018 shows a headline that reads "Speaker Sara in 2019?" which suggests a different context than the claim of her running for president in 2022.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the image of Sara Duterte reading a newspaper with the headline "Sara in 2022" is genuine and accurately reflects her intention to run for president.
Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the significance of the image by presenting it as evidence of Sara Duterte's candidacy for president when there is no official confirmation.
Understate: There is no evidence of understating biases in the provided claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters at times by presenting a doctored image that misrepresents the original article from The Philippine Star in 2018.
